TorBox Downloader is a powerful, user-friendly Chrome extension designed to work in unison with the TorBox service in order to enhance your download experience. TorBox Downloader allows you to easily manage and speed up your downloads, ensuring fast and secure file transfers. Use the TorBox API to download files quickly and safely. Download from URLs, magnet links, and Usenet files. Monitor and control your active downloads directly from the extension popup. Keep track of your completed downloads and get links to download with ease. Customize your seeding preferences. Option to compress big downloads into ZIP files for easier storage and transfer. Pause all active downloads at once and resume at your convenience. Switch between light and dark themes according to your preference. Enjoy a faster download speed with TorBox API. Manage all of your downloads from a single, easy-to-use interface. Tailor the extension settings to fit your specific download and seeding preferences. Simple and intuitive design makes it easy for anyone to use. Keep your downloads safe and secure with built-in security features.

Install TorBox Downloader today and take control of your downloads with ease and efficiency!
